pullRequest.title: Fix RunExecutable task to reflect actual status of program execution
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
Fix RunExecutable task to reflect actual status of program execution
Fixes #26084
Approach
Samples
Remarks
Check List

 Read the Contributing Guide
 Updated Change Log
 Checked Tooling Support (#)
 Added necessary tests

 Unit Tests
 Spec Conformance Tests
 Integration Tests
 Ballerina By Example Tests


 Increased Test Coverage
 Added necessary documentation

 API documentation
 Module documentation in Module.md files
 Ballerina By Examples
